Boots.description:
UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''
Boots.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and Cooldown Reduction
Boots.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.) ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''

Boots.description:
+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 35%.

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Mercury's Treads
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and reduces duration of disabling effects
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Magic Resist UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 35%. (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
+25 Armor

UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 10% of the damage from basic attacks.
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Ninja Tabi
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and reduces incoming basic attack damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Armor UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 10% of the damage from basic attacks. UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants +25 Attack Damage and Bloodlust for 3 minutes.

Bloodlust: Dealing physical damage to champions heals for 10% of the damage dealt. Scoring a Kill or Assist extends the duration of this Flask by 30 seconds.

(Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Wrath
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily grants Attack Damage and heals you when dealing physical damage.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +25 Attack Damage and Bloodlust for 3 minutes. Bloodlust: Dealing physical damage to champions heals for 10% of the damage dealt. Scoring a Kill or Assist extends the duration of this Flask by 30 seconds. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)

Endgame Items.description:
+30 Attack Damage
+30 Ability Power
+30% Attack Speed
+10% Critical Strike Chance
+8% Movement Speed
+250 Health
+200 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Basic attacks grant 20 Movement Speed for 2 seconds. Kills grant 60 Movement Speed instead. This Movement Speed bonus is halved for ranged champions.
UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 200% of base Attack Damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Trinity Force
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Attack Damage +30 Ability Power +30% Attack Speed +10% Critical Strike Chance +8% Movement Speed +250 Health +200 Mana UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Basic attacks grant 20 Movement Speed for 2 seconds. Kills grant 60 Movement Speed instead. This Movement Speed bonus is halved for ranged champions. UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 200% of base Attack Damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Attack Damage
+20% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive: Critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of 200%.
Endgame Items.name: Infinity Edge
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Attack Damage +20% Critical Strike Chance UNIQUE Passive: Critical strikes deal 250% damage instead of 200%.

Endgame Items.description:
+40% Attack Speed
+20% Critical Strike Chance
+6% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive: Grants Static Charges upon moving or attacking. At 100 Charges, basic attacking expends all Charges to deal 100 bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit (this damage can critically strike).
Endgame Items.name: Statikk Shiv
Endgame Items.plaintext: Movement builds charges that release chain lightning on basic attack
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +40% Attack Speed +20% Critical Strike Chance +6% Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive: Grants Static Charges upon moving or attacking. At 100 Charges, basic attacking expends all Charges to deal 100 bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit (this damage can critically strike).

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: +20% Life Steal
UNIQUE Passive: Your basic attacks can now overheal you. Excess life is stored as a shield that can block 50-350 damage, based on champion level.

This shield decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.
Endgame Items.name: The Bloodthirster
Endgame Items.plaintext: Grants Attack Damage, Life Steal and Life Steal now overheals
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Attack Damage UNIQUE Passive: +20% Life Steal UNIQUE Passive: Your basic attacks can now overheal you. Excess life is stored as a shield that can block 50-350 damage, based on champion level. This shield decays slowly if you haven't dealt or taken damage in the last 25 seconds.

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+60 Magic Resist
+150% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Increases all healing received by 20%.
Endgame Items.name: Spirit Visage
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +60 Magic Resist +150% Base Health Regen +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Increases all healing received by 20%.

Endgame Items.description:
+40 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: Physical damage ignores 35% of the target's Armor (applies before Armor Penetration).
Endgame Items.name: Last Whisper
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +40 Attack Damage UNIQUE Passive: Physical damage ignores 35% of the target's Armor (applies before Armor Penetration).

Endgame Items.description:
+30 Attack Damage
+15% Critical Strike Chance
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: +20 Armor Penetration
UNIQUE Active: Grants +20% Movement Speed and +40% Attack Speed for 6 seconds (45 second cooldown).

(Armor Penetration: Physical damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Armor equal to Armor Penetration.)
Endgame Items.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
Endgame Items.plaintext: Activate to greatly increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Attack Damage +15% Critical Strike Chance +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: +20 Armor Penetration UNIQUE Active: Grants +20% Movement Speed and +40% Attack Speed for 6 seconds (45 second cooldown). (Armor Penetration: Physical damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Armor equal to Armor Penetration.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown).

At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds.

Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player.

(Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown). At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).

Starting Items.description:
UNIQUE Passive: Holds 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 120 Health and 60 Mana over 12 seconds.

Starting Items.plaintext: Restores Health and Mana over time, refills at shop
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive: Holds 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop. UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 120 Health and 60 Mana over 12 seconds.
